result.title: 266A Stones on the Table Problem Solution in c++
result.content:
include<bits/stdc++.h>

include

include

include

include

using namespace std;

int main() { string stone ; int count= 0; int n; cin >>n >> stone; for(int i = 1; i < n; i++ ){ if(stone[i]==stone[i-1]) count++; }

cout << count << endl;
return 0;

}
